001package com.pingidentity.sdk.pingonewallet.storage.data_repository;
002
003import androidx.lifecycle.MutableLiveData;
004
005import com.pingidentity.did.sdk.client.service.model.ApplicationInstance;
006import com.pingidentity.did.sdk.types.Claim;
007import com.pingidentity.did.sdk.types.ClaimReference;
008import com.pingidentity.sdk.pingonewallet.contracts.StorageManagerContract;
009import com.pingidentity.sdk.pingonewallet.storage.StorageErrorHandler;
010import com.pingidentity.sdk.pingonewallet.types.regions.PingOneRegion;
011
012import java.util.List;
013import java.util.Set;
014
015public interface DataRepository {
016
017    /**
018     * Initialize DataRepository with implementation of StorageManagerContract
019     * @param storageManager: Implementation of StorageManagerContract
020     * @see StorageManagerContract
021     */
022    void init(StorageManagerContract storageManager);
023
024    /**
025     * Saves credential to storage
026     * @param credential: Claim to save
027     */
028    void saveCredential(Claim credential);
029
030    /**
031     * Get Credential for id
032     * @param id: String id for stored Claim
033     * @return Claim if found, null otherwise
034     */
035    Claim getCredential(String id);
036
037    /**
038     * Save reference for revoked credentials
039     * @param credentialReference: ClaimReference
040     */
041    void saveCredentialReference(ClaimReference credentialReference);
042
043    /**
044     * Get reference for revoked credentials
045     * @param id: String id for stored ClaimReference
046     * @return ClaimReference if found, null otherwise
047     */
048    ClaimReference getCredentialReference(String id);
049
050    /**
051     * Check if a credential had been revoked
052     * @param credentialId: String credential id
053     * @return boolean: True if credential revoked, False otherwise
054     */
055    boolean isCredentialRevoked(String credentialId);
056
057    /**
058     * Delete credential from storage
059     * @param id: String id for the credential to delete
060     */
061    void deleteCredential(String id);
062
063    /**
064     * Retrieve all stored credentials
065     * @return List of Claim objects.
066     */
067    List<Claim> getAllCredentials();
068    MutableLiveData<List<Claim>> subscribeCredentialsChange();
069    void saveCredentialIds(Set<String> credentialIds);
070    void saveCredentialReferenceIds(Set<String> credentialReferenceIds);
071    Set<PingOneRegion> getRegions();
072    void saveRegions(Set<PingOneRegion> pingOneRegions);
073
074    void setStorageErrorHandler(StorageErrorHandler storageErrorHandler);
075    StorageErrorHandler getStorageErrorHandler();
076
077    void saveApplicationInstance(PingOneRegion walletRegion, ApplicationInstance applicationInstance);
078    ApplicationInstance getApplicationInstance();
079    ApplicationInstance getApplicationInstance(PingOneRegion walletRegion);
080    void saveString(String str, String key);
081    String getString(String key);
082    void saveStringSet(Set<String> set, String key);
083    Set<String> getStringSet(String key);
084
085}
